title: Fix frontend deployment blockers and improve failure diagnostics

requirements.summary: Ensure the frontend builds/deploys cleanly and surface complete error details for faster diagnosis when deploy/runtime initialization fails.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build + deploy attempt completes without errors.
If the deploy fails again, the full error output (including stack trace/log lines) is captured and surfaced in the deployment output for diagnosis.
After the fix, `dfx deploy` (or the platformâ€™s equivalent deployment command) succeeds for both backend and frontend artifacts.

Improve error normalization so technical details always retain the raw error text and (when available) stack trace, enabling complete copy/paste diagnostics when backend calls fail during or after deploy.

Expand the existing technical-details UI to display and copy the full raw error text (and stack when present), not just request/canister/method fields, so failures include all diagnostic log lines for troubleshooting.

Enhance startup failure rendering to show/copy full error message plus stack and ensure console logging includes full errorInfo, improving the ability to capture complete failure output when the app cannot initialize after deployment.
